subject: Career
title: Building Credibility from Scratch
description: Learn Building Credibility from Scratch in one minute.

hook.text: In your old career, people trusted you. In the new one, you're unproven. Credibility starts at zero.

buildup.text: Credibility has two components: competence (can you do it?) and character (can you be trusted?).

discovery.text: Character transfers immediately. Competence must be demonstrated freshly in each new context.

twist.text: Small wins build credibility faster than big promises. Deliver on small things first.

climax.text: Ask for a challenging but achievable early project. Success there becomes your credibility anchor.

punchline.text: Credibility isn't inherited. It's earned â€” one delivery at a time.
